0.9.2.name: connect20/BL_CustomGrid
0.9.2.description:
Allows to customize all admin grids and add to it lots of useful features and new columns.
With an in-grid editor, to update values directly from the grids.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
